name: ALOpsAppCopy
description: Copy AL Extensions between Business Central Service Tiers
author: Hodor
helpMarkDown: Copy Business Central extensions from one service tier to another.

inputs.name: nav_computername
inputs.label: Computer Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target Business Central Server running service tier. $(nav_computername)

inputs.name: nav_serverinstance_source
inputs.label: Source Server Instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source Business Central service tier to copy from. $(nav_serverinstance_source)

inputs.name: nav_serverinstance_target
inputs.label: Target Server Instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target Business Central service tier to copy to. $(nav_serverinstance_target)

inputs.name: nav_app_storage
inputs.label: App Storage Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path used for temporary extension storage. $(nav_app_storage)
